member.name: T:Skender.Stock.Indicators.StochResult
member.summary:
Stochastic indicator results includes aliases for those who prefer the simpler K,D,J outputs.
See documentation for more information.
member.remarks:
Standard output properties:
Oscillator %K Oscillator over prior lookback periods.
Signal %D Simple moving average of %K Oscillator.
PercentJ
%J is the weighted divergence of %K and %D: %J=3×%K-2×%D
These are the aliases of the above properties:
K Same as Oscillator.
D Same as Signal.
J Same as PercentJ.
